greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Self-inverse permutation of nonnegative integers, A054429-conjugate of blue code: a(n) = A054429(A193231(A054429(n))).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: def a054429(n): return 1 if n==1 else 2*a054429(int(n/2)) + 1 - n%2
def a(n): return n if n<2 else a054429(a193231(a054429(n))) # _Indranil Ghosh_, Jun 05 2017
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 28 2013
